title: How can Facebook be beaten as the biggest social network? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not easily. Facebook has been one of the very few sites that has managed to remain relevant with the changing times. If you check the first version of Twitter and the one that exists now you'll realize that it hasn't changed too much. It sure has had a few changes and updates but not a lot. Facebook on the other hand has adapted itself to the changing needs of people, acquired upcoming apps and when they couldn't acquire they copied. So sure there could be a platform that could surpass Facebook but it will have to be phenomenal and remain relevant long enough to get more than a billion users.

Beating Facebook isnt a easy task .. its has one of the best ad sceams that even Google dosent have. And in terms of beeing a social network you should have a better idea .. that would help get connected to people and many a people could understand it easily . So what do you need is a better ideaGood inventmentPlans to expandAnd get updated every now and then
